Pros and Cons Review:
- Pros: The project is highly practical, helping HR automate employee satisfaction analysis and attrition risk prediction, reducing HR costs.
- Cons: Data quality may vary due to subjective employee input; sentiment analysis accuracy needs improvement.

Suggestions for Improvement: Consider integrating a more advanced NLP model to enhance sentiment detection and improve filtering of low-quality input.

Personal Takeaways: I learned how to integrate CSV analysis, NLP-based quantification, PDF generation, and automated uploading to create a complete AI-driven tool.

AI Agent Code Integration Suggestions: The User Process Agent could handle automatic form data fetching, while the Assistant Agent manages sentiment analysis, risk classification, and final PDF generation.
